basics.name: Jimwell V Baja
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Finance & Manamgent Information Systems in the Shidler College of Business with a Minor in Filipino with the Filipino Language and Culture Program at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

education.area: Finance, Management Information Systems, Filipino (Expected Spring, 2024)

highlights: Maintained daily product stock and shelf supply
Increased sales of customers monthly through up-selling & friendly attitude
Lead daily return mails and inquired with clients on correct information
Archived 10+ deceased client data daily and processed account closure
Researched 200+ client accounts to determine card eligibility
Helped in preparing and filing 10-15 tax returns weekly
Obtained V.I.T.A. Advanced certification for free tax return preparation
Computed taxes owed by following tax code
I.T. Officer/Director of Career Development, Business Executive Society of Tomorrow, 2020-Present
Director of Human Resources, Financial Management Association, 2021-Present

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Sophomore of the Year
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii Shidler College of Business Awards Night
awards.summary: I was awarded a scholarship for being the Outstanding Sophomore at the Shidler College of Business.
